channel.title: Coding help
channel.description: Hey I'm a 15 old kid and I wanna learn to code. I know nothing a about coding but I know how to run a server but that's all I can do are thiny things, like making npc talk but I can't make it all alone I'm good at editing that's wy I wanna learn to make things or add like skills or items or make minigamea like barrow fightcaves ect.. Or maybe my own Source. :)

item.title: Coding help

item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

thekid120:

i know how to do that i got a source 771 its online fine working but i wanna add thing to it like skills and other thing

Okay, so you know nothing about coding but you go right ahead and go straight into a 771 server DAFUQ? Start off small, maybe a 317 delta learn you way to coding then reach that 771…
